item.title: Coarse Universality
item.description: The Bourgain index is a tool that can be used to show that if a separable Banach space contains isomorphic copies of all members of a class C then it must contain isomorphic copies of all separable Banach spaces. This can be applied, e.g., to the class C of separable reflexive spaces.
